entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @MiaFarrow Trump has avoided structured press conferences with the White House press corps for over three years. But the lure of the spotlight at the daily White House press briefings on the coronavirus was too much of a temptation for Trump to resist, and he has finally exposed himself.
